# README Badges

README.md 상단에 추가할 수 있는 배지들입니다.

## 권장 배지

```markdown
# SEPilot Desktop

[![CI](https://github.com/vtopia-dev/sepilot_desktop/workflows/CI/badge.svg)](https://github.com/vtopia-dev/sepilot_desktop/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
[![Release](https://github.com/vtopia-dev/sepilot_desktop/workflows/Release/badge.svg)](https://github.com/vtopia-dev/sepilot_desktop/actions/workflows/release.yml)
[![CodeQL](https://github.com/vtopia-dev/sepilot_desktop/workflows/CodeQL%20Security%20Scan/badge.svg)](https://github.com/vtopia-dev/sepilot_desktop/actions/workflows/codeql.yml)
[![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-Apache%202.0-blue.svg)](LICENSE)
[![GitHub release](https://img.shields.io/github/release/vtopia-dev/sepilot_desktop.svg)](https://github.com/vtopia-dev/sepilot_desktop/releases)
[![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/vtopia-dev/sepilot_desktop.svg)](https://github.com/vtopia-dev/sepilot_desktop/stargazers)
[![GitHub issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/vtopia-dev/sepilot_desktop.svg)](https://github.com/vtopia-dev/sepilot_desktop/issues)
[![PRs Welcome](https://img.shields.io/badge/PRs-welcome-brightgreen.svg)](CONTRIBUTING.md)
```

## 사용 예시

```markdown
<div align="center">

# SEPilot Desktop

[![CI](https://github.com/vtopia-dev/sepilot_desktop/workflows/CI/badge.svg)](https://github.com/vtopia-dev/sepilot_desktop/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
[![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-Apache%202.0-blue.svg)](LICENSE)
[![PRs Welcome](https://img.shields.io/badge/PRs-welcome-brightgreen.svg)](CONTRIBUTING.md)

**LLM Desktop Application with LangGraph, RAG, and MCP**

[Features](#features) • [Installation](#installation) • [Documentation](#documentation) • [Contributing](CONTRIBUTING.md)

</div>
```

## 참고사항

- GitHub Organization 이름을 `vtopia-dev`로 가정했습니다. 실제 Organization/User 이름으로 변경하세요.
- Discord, Twitter 등의 배지는 실제 서비스를 사용하는 경우에만 추가하세요.
- 배지가 너무 많으면 오히려 지저분해 보일 수 있으니 핵심적인 것만 선택하세요.
